sub_title: at Erasmus Research Institute in Management
summary:
Business School Professor with an interest in comparative corporate governance, management of professional service firms, bureaucracy theory, institutional theory, business ethics, and issues management.

Specialties: research methods, issues management, reputation management; industry experience with: professional service firms, beer breweries, genetically modified food industry
